meanings.definition: Allis: used to refer to a group of people or things together
meanings.sent1: Allis of students gathered in the library for a study session.
meanings.sent2: The allis of flowers in the garden looked beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The allis of ducks waddling in a row was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: The allis of stars in the night sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent5: The allis of colorful balloons filled the room with joy.

meanings.definition: Allis: used to indicate the whole quantity or extent of something
meanings.sent1: She ate allis of the cake at the party.
meanings.sent2: The children played outside allis afternoon.
meanings.sent3: He ran allis around the park, trying to catch his kite.
meanings.sent4: The music was so loud, it filled the room allis.
meanings.sent5: The sun shone allis, making the day perfect for a picnic.
